description: This file is a configuration script for Vite, a build tool, specifically for a project using Qwik framework. It defines the base configuration, imports necessary plugins, manages dependencies, and includes utility functions for dependency validation.

methods.name: errorOnDuplicatesPkgDeps
methods.description: Function to identify duplicate dependencies and throw an error if any are found in both devDependencies and dependencies, or if qwik packages are misplaced.
